channel.title: Info panel help
channel.description:
Ok first off I need to know if you can add an info panel on non-silabs and if so I need help adding it and getting it to say players online/owner/latest updates and couple other important things
here is what the info panel is if i confused you
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/2175/infopaneltx7.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Info panel help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Here are the Interface Id’s:

Sorry for c’s all my things are in a handler.

//Right hand side c.sendQuest("", 15896); c.sendQuest("", 15901); c.sendQuest("", 15902); c.sendQuest("", 15903); c.sendQuest("", 15904); c.sendQuest("", 15905); c.sendQuest("", 15906);

//Left hand side if(c.InBarrows()) { c.sendQuest("@whi@", 15895); } else if(!c.InBarrows()) { c.sendQuest("@whi@", 15895); } c.sendQuest("@whi@: @gre@", 15900); c.sendQuest("@whi@Players Online: @gre@"+players, 15898);

c.sendQuest("@whi@", 15894); //Title

Read full topic

item.title: Info panel help
item.dc:creator: @crip_4_lyfe crip 4 lyfe
item.description:
@crip_4_lyfe wrote:

If I’m right go into client.java and search for @gre@ latest updates or what ever you want to change and it should come up and just delete what it says but not the @gre@ unless you want to change the color not to be green and put your name per say if you want to change who owner is delete what it says currently and change it to your user name.
Hope this helped ? =]

Read full topic
